title: Admin Page

welcome.title: Welcome to the Admin Page
welcome.message: Here you can manage a wide range of things (Is something missing? Contact spindelman@fsektionen.se). Use the menu on the left to navigate between the different sections. You should only have access to the sections you have permissions for; if this is not the case, please contact a webmaster.

news.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this news item?
news.page_description: Here you can create news and edit existing news on the website. News will be sorted by pin date, then bump date, and finally publish date. You can use the bump function to move news to the top of the list, and pinning to keep a news item at the top of the list for a certain time.
news.use_pinning: Pin the news item to the top of the news list

events.page_description: Here you can create and manage events. Tip: If you want an event to have no max attendance, set the "max event users" to 0. You must select the seat allocation method when creating the event by checking or unchecking "Spots will be selected by lottery". If seats are not allocated by lottery, the first-come, first-served principle will apply. In both cases, priority groups will be given priority when seats are allocated.
events.calendar_description: This calendar shows all events. Click on an event to edit it. Click or drag on the calendar to select a time range, then click on 'Add Event'. Blue events may not have reached the backend yet. Reload the page if you get an error to ensure you have the latest information.
events.list_description: This list shows all events. Click on an event to edit it.
events.error_delete: Failed to delete event with id:
events.error_edit: Failed to edit event with id:
events.dot_type: Time precision (ask your mentor about this)
events.lottery: Spots will be selected by lottery
events.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this event?

documents.description: Here you can manage documents available for download. The category names are free text, so search for categories beforehand to avoid creating a category with a similar but different name.
documents.title: Title
documents.name: Name
documents.file_type_error: Invalid file type. Allowed file types are: .pdf, .jpg, .png, .txt
documents.file_size_error: File size must not exceed 5 MB
documents.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this document?
documents.author: Created by

car.title: Manage Car Bookings
car.description: Here you can create and manage car bookings. If you are the car foreman, you may want to come in here from time to time to approve or deny (remove) bookings from users.
car.default_description: Enter title of car booking here (publicly visible)
car.no_council_needed: No council is used for personal bookings
car.error_start_end: The end time must be after the start time.
car.error_past_event: The start time must be in the future.
car.calendar_description: This calendar shows all bookings. Click on a booking to edit it. Click or drag on the calendar to select a time range, then click on 'Add Event'. Blue bookings may not have reached the backend yet. Reload the page if you get an error to ensure you have the latest information.
car.list_description: This list shows all bookings. Click on a booking to edit it.
car.blockings_description: This list shows all users blocked from booking cars.
car.delete_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove this car booking?
car.delete_confirm_description: A popup dialog confirming the deletion of a car booking.

councils.title: Manage Councils
councils.description_subtitle: Here you can create and manage councils. Go to the posts tab to manage posts.
councils.name: Name
councils.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this council?

posts.title: Manage Posts
posts.description: Here you can create and manage council posts. The email doesn't have to be unique, and will be displayed publicly (to members) on the council page. You can also assign door access to posts.
posts.name: Name
posts.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this post?

permissions.no_post_selected: No post selected. Go back and select a post to administer.
permissions.title: Manage specific permissions for posts
permissions.description: Here you can update post permissions & remove existing permissions on the website.

posts.select_doors: Select doors to grant access to

user-posts.list_description: Here you can assign and manage council posts for users.
user-posts.search_placeholder: Search by name, email, or STIL ID
user-posts.confirm_remove_all_text: Are you sure you want to remove all council posts for this user?

permissions.title: Manage permissions
permissions.description: Here you can create and manage permissions, which can then be assigned to positions. Permissions still have to be supported by the backend to work.
permissions.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this permission?

member.list_description: This list shows all users. You can search, filter by date, and manage membership status. You can search for multiple members by adding comma signs between. Your search terms must be at least 3 characters long.
member.search_placeholder: Search by name, email, or STIL ID.
member.bulk_member_confirm_desc: Read through the list of users before doing this! Are you sure you want to make the following number of users members
member.bulk_member_success: All users were made members successfully.
member.bulk_member_error: Failed to make some users members:
member.show_verified_only: Show users with verified email only

mail_aliases.title: Manage Mail Aliases
mail_aliases.description: Here you can create and manage mail aliases.
mail_aliases.list_description: Here you can manage mail aliases. You can search, add and remove aliases and their members.
mail_aliases.search_placeholder: Search by alias or email address
mail_aliases.delete_source_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete this alias? This action cannot be undone.
mail_aliases.add_target_error: Failed to add member to alias.
mail_aliases.remove_target_error: Failed to remove member from alias.
mail_aliases.invalid_domain: Email address must belong to the @fsektionen.se domain.

albums.page_description: Here you can create and manage albums. After creating an album can you add photographers and photos.
albums.warning: Please note that the album date cannot be changed later!
albums.only_empty: Only empty albums can be deleted
albums.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this album?
albums.title: Title

album.dragndrop: Drag images here or click to upload

name: Name

main.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This cannot be undone.
main.name: Name

group_admin.intro: Here you can create and edit fadder groups and adventure missions

groups.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
groups.title: Title
groups.add_error: Could not add group to introduction.

missions.intro: Click on a mission to edit or delete it! You can create new missions with the button below. Tip: Set minimum points to 0 since the minimum can be given to groups that completed the mission but did not pass.

mission_grading.toast_add_error: Could not mark mission as completed.
mission_grading.toast_remove_error: Could not mark mission as uncompleted.
mission_grading.intro: Here you can edit completed missions and set points for them. Green means the mission is completed, yellow means it is under review, and red means it is failed (try again).

group_members.info_text: On this page you can manage members in the "{{group}}" group. You can add or remove members from the group. Use the search field to find users to add to the group. You can search by name, program, and start year.
group_members.toast_remove_error: Could not remove user from group.
group_members.toast_add_error: Could not add user to group.

room_bookings.page_description: Here you can create and manage room bookings. Users without posts may come to you with questions about booking the rooms for personal use, since they cannot book rooms on their own. You can create multiple bookings at once, up to 50. Be careful! You have to remove them individually if something goes wrong!
room_bookings.no_council_needed: No council is needed for personal bookings
room_bookings.error_start_end: The end time must be after the start time.
room_bookings.error_past_event: The start time must be in the future.
room_bookings.calendar_description: This calendar shows all room bookings. Click on a booking to edit it. Click or drag on the calendar to select a time range, then click on 'Add Event'. Blue bookings may not have reached the backend yet. Reload the page if you get an error to ensure you have the latest information.
room_bookings.list_description: This list shows all room bookings. Click on a booking to edit it.
room_bookings.blockings_description: This list shows all users blocked from booking rooms.
room_bookings.delete_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove this room booking?
room_bookings.delete_confirm_description: A popup dialog confirming the deletion of a room booking.
room_bookings.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this booking?
room_bookings.recurrence_warning: Be careful! You can create up to 50 bookings at once, but must edit or remove them individually! You cannot undo the recurrence after creating the bookings.

remove_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
remove_confirm_description: A popup dialog confirming the deletion of an item.

door_access.page_title: Manage Door Access for Individual Users.
door_access.page_description: Here you can manage user access to doors. To manage door access for posts, go to the post admin page and click to edit a post.
door_access.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this door access?
door_access.search_user: Search by name or user ID

song_categories.title: Manage Song Categories
song_categories.description_subtitle: Here you can create and manage song categories.
song_categories.name: Name
song_categories.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this song category?

songs.title: Manage Songs
songs.description_subtitle: Here you can create and manage songs.
songs.author: Author
songs.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this song?

event_signup.title: Event Signups
event_signup.description: Manage registrations for this event. You can search, filter, confirm and edit registrations below. "Hand out spots" will automatically select users who will be allocated a place, using a lottery or first come, first served basis, and priorities. You can then review the list, change anything that looks incorrect, and take your time. Users will only see if they have been allocated a place when you mark the places as final with "Confirm Places". Once you have done this, you cannot change anything, so make sure you have done everything correctly before then!
event_signup.pending: Waiting to see if you got a spot
event_signup.spot_denied: You did not get a spot.
event_signup.hand_out_spots_closed: Hand out is only available after signup has closed and before final confirmation.
event_signup.hand_out_spots_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to hand out spots? You have to unconfirm users' spots individually if you want to change anything.
event_signup.confirm_places_desc: This will finalize the allocation of spots to users. You can not undo this action, it locks the event and you will not be able to change any allocated spots afterwards. Make sure you have checked the list of signups and that everything is correct before confirming.
event_signup.confirm_places_input: Type CONFIRM to confirm you are completely done with managing handed out spots.
event_signup.search_placeholder: Search signups by name, group, priority, email
event_signup.event_users_confirmed_description: The spots have been confirmed, no editing!

cafe_shifts.title: Cafe Shifts
cafe_shifts.description: Create and manage cafe shift slots. Use the calendar or list to add, edit, and assign shifts. Use the button below to add multiple shifts at once. The shifts are added between 08:00-10:00, 10:00-13:00 on each work day.
cafe_shifts.calendar_description: This calendar shows all cafe shifts. Click on a shift to edit it. Click or drag to select a time range and add a shift.
cafe_shifts.list_description: This list shows all cafe shifts. Click a row to edit it.
cafe_shifts.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this shift?

multi.title: Create Multiple Shifts
multi.description: Create multiple shifts across weeks. You can select a start and end week (inclusive) and max 4 weeks at a time.
